data.name: Gridap.jl
data.description: Grid-based approximation of partial differential equations in Julia

evidence: "Gridap provides a set of tools for the grid-based approximation of partial differential equations (PDEs) written in the Julia programming language. The library currently supports..." (described as a library/toolbox, intended to be used from Julia code)

"Gridap has a very expressive API allowing one to solve complex PDEs with very few lines of code. The user can write the underlying weak form..." (used as a computational tool to solve PDEs, directly producing scientific results)

"Gridap is a registered package in the official Julia package registry... Open the Julia REPL, type `]` to enter package mode, and install as follows `pkg> add Gridap`" (installation via Julia package registry)
